ai-mil7.4.3:1.1_0: “Reverend Sister, what are the five factors should be called by one who belongs to?”
ai-mil7.4.3:1.2_0: “As a grass fire burn up the grass, sticks, and branches below.
ai-mil7.4.3:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, all of them—past, future, or present—all of them contemptuous, oppressed by desire and ill will—all of them contemptuously.
ai-mil7.4.3:1.4_0: This is the first kind of fire.
ai-mil7.4.3:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, that frightens arrow.
ai-mil7.4.3:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, the meditator with its own defilements but not discerning all the opposites that should be expected.
ai-mil7.4.3:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, one who spends the cold life:
ai-mil7.4.3:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator who is skilled at ease after getting rid of energy ...
ai-mil7.4.3:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, is committed to the heat bait of fire, savings there.
ai-mil7.4.3:4.2_0: In the same way, the meditator with a mind shamelessly wandering around to embarrassed with fire. He will meditate with a heart like the fire oppressed, with a heart free of stains, liberated, with a mind free of opposites.
ai-mil7.4.3:5.1_0: Furthermore, great king, having destroyed the darkness of night, looked down on the darkness,
ai-mil7.4.3:5.2_0: In the same way, great king, a meditator who is like the opposite-movers of ignorance, having destroyed the darkness and light of knowledge.
ai-mil7.4.3:5.3_0: This is the fifth vicinity of fire.
ai-mil7.4.3:5.4_0: The Buddha has given an instruction:
ai-mil7.4.3:6.2_0: For when you meditate like fire, pleasant and unpleasant contacts will not occupy your mind.’”
ai-mil7.4.3:7.1_0: The third enquiry, is the third (called) Discipline,
